verses.verse: וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל <WH914> vai-yav-Del separated דָּוִיד֩ <WH1732> da-Vid Moreover David וְשָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and the captains הַצָּבָ֜א <WH6635> hatz-tza-Va of the host לַעֲבֹדָ֗ה <WH5656> la-'a-vo-Dah, to the service לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons אָסָף֙ <WH623> 'a-Saf of Asaph וְהֵימָ֣ן <WH1968> ve-hei-Man and of Heman וִֽידוּת֔וּן <WH3038> vi-du-Tun, and of Jeduthun; הַנְּבִּיאִים han-ne-bi-'im כהַֽנִּבְּאִ֛ים <WH5030> han-nib-be-'Im prophecy קבְּכִנֹּר֥וֹת <WH3658> be-chin-no-Rot with harps בִּנְבָלִ֖ים <WH5035> bin-va-Lim with psalteries וּבִמְצִלְתָּ֑יִם <WH4700> u-vim-tzil-Ta-yim; and with cymbals וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become מִסְפָּרָ֔ם <WH4557> mis-pa-Ram, and the number אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei of those מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> me-la-Chah performed לַעֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <WH5656> la-'a-vo-da-Tam. according to their service

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei Of the sons אָסָ֗ף <WH623> 'a-Saf, of Asaph זַכּ֧וּר <WH2139> zak-Kur Zaccur וְיוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> ve-yo-Sef and Joseph וּנְתַנְיָ֥ה <WH5418> u-ne-tan-Yah and Nethaniah וַאֲשַׂרְאֵ֖לָה <WH841> va-'a-sar-'E-lah and Asarelah בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons אָסָ֑ף <WH623> 'a-Saf; of Asaph עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al under יַד־ <WH3027> yad- under the hands אָסָ֔ף <WH623> 'a-Saf, of Asaph הַנִּבָּ֖א <WH5012> han-nib-Ba which prophesied עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- under יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> ye-Dei according to the order הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. of the king

לִידוּת֑וּן <WH3038> li-du-Tun; Of Jeduthun בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons יְדוּת֡וּן <WH3038> ye-du-Tun of Jeduthun גְּדַלְיָ֡הוּ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu Gedaliah וּצְרִ֡י <WH6874> u-tze-Ri and Zeri וִֽ֠ישַׁעְיָהוּ <WH3470> Vi-sha'-ya-hu and Jeshaiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֨הוּ <WH2811> cha-shav-Ya-hu Hashabiah וּמַתִּתְיָ֜הוּ <WH4993> u-mat-tit-Ya-hu and Mattithiah שִׁשָּׁ֗ה <WH8337> shish-Shah, six עַל֩ <WH5921> 'al under יְדֵ֨י <WH3027> ye-Dei under the hands אֲבִיהֶ֤ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem of their father יְדוּתוּן֙ <WH3038> ye-du-Tun Jeduthun בַּכִּנּ֔וֹר <WH3658> bak-kin-Nor, with a harp הַנִּבָּ֕א <WH5012> han-nib-Ba who prophesied עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- under הֹד֥וֹת <WH3034> ho-Dot to give thanks וְהַלֵּ֖ל <WH1984> ve-hal-Lel and to praise לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

לְהֵימָ֑ן <WH1968> le-hei-Man; Of Heman בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons הֵימָ֡ן <WH1968> hei-Man of Heman בֻּקִּיָּ֡הוּ <WH1232> buk-ki-Ya-hu Bukkiah מַתַּנְיָ֡הוּ <WH4983> mat-tan-Ya-hu Mattaniah עֻ֠זִּיאֵל <WH5816> 'Uz-zi-'el Uzziel שְׁבוּאֵ֨ל <WH7619> she-vu-'El Shebuel וִֽירִימ֜וֹת <WH3406> vi-ri-Mot and Jerimoth חֲנַנְיָ֣ה <WH2608> cha-nan-Yah Hananiah חֲנָ֗נִי <WH2607> cha-Na-ni, Hanani אֱלִיאָ֤תָה <WH448> 'e-li-'A-tah Eliathah גִדַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH1437> gid-Dal-ti Giddalti וְרֹמַ֣מְתִּי ve-ro-Mam-ti עֶ֔זֶר <WH7320> 'E-zer, and Romamtiezer יָשְׁבְּקָ֣שָׁה <WH3436> ya-she-be-Ka-shah Joshbekashah מַלּ֔וֹתִי <WH4413> mal-Lo-ti, Mallothi הוֹתִ֖יר <WH1956> ho-Tir Hothir מַחֲזִיאֽוֹת׃ <WH4238> ma-cha-zi-'ot. [and] Mahazioth

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these בָנִ֜ים <WH1121> va-Nim All these [were] the sons לְהֵימָ֗ן <WH1968> le-hei-Man, of Heman חֹזֵ֥ה <WH2374> cho-Zeh seer הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king's בְּדִבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> be-div-Rei in the words הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God לְהָרִ֣ים <WH7311> le-ha-Rim to lift up קָ֑רֶן <WH7161> Ka-ren; the horn וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten gave הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him And God לְהֵימָ֗ן <WH1968> le-hei-Man, to Heman בָּנִ֛ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen וּבָנ֥וֹת <WH1323> u-va-Not daughters שָׁלֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH7969> sha-Loosh. and three

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- were under יְדֵי֩ <WH3027> ye-Dei All these [were] under the hands אֲבִיהֶ֨ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem of their father בַּשִּׁ֜יר <WH7892> bash-Shir for song בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit [in] the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בִּמְצִלְתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4700> bim-tzil-Ta-yim with cymbals נְבָלִ֣ים <WH5035> ne-va-Lim psalteries וְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <WH3658> ve-chin-no-Rot, and harps לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al under יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> ye-Dei order הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, according to the king's ס sa-Mek אָסָ֥ף <WH623> 'a-Saf to Asaph וִידוּת֖וּן <WH3038> vi-du-Tun Jeduthun וְהֵימָֽן׃ <WH1968> ve-hei-Man. and Heman

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi become מִסְפָּרָם֙ <WH4557> mis-pa-Ram So the number עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem, of them with their brethren מְלֻמְּדֵי־ <WH3925> me-lum-me-dei- that were instructed שִׁ֖יר <WH7892> shir in the songs לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- that הַ֨מֵּבִ֔ין <WH995> ham-me-Vin, [even] all that were cunning מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim was two hundred שְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> she-mo-Nim fourscore וּשְׁמוֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight

וַיַּפִּ֜ילוּ <WH5307> vai-yap-Pi-lu And they cast גּוֹרָל֣וֹת <WH1486> go-ra-Lot lots מִשְׁמֶ֗רֶת <WH4931> mish-Me-ret, ward לְעֻמַּת֙ <WH5980> le-'um-Mat against כַּקָּטֹ֣ן <WH6996> kak-ka-Ton [ward] as well the small כַּגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> kag-ga-Dol, as the great מֵבִ֖ין <WH995> me-Vin the teacher עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- accompanying תַּלְמִֽיד׃ <WH8527> tal-Mid. as the scholar פ Peh

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came forth הַגּוֹרָ֧ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral lot הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon Now the first לְאָסָ֖ף <WH623> le-'a-Saf for Asaph לְיוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> le-yo-Sef; to Joseph גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu to Gedaliah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, the second הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- he וְאֶחָ֥יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav who with his brethren וּבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav and sons שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֣י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi The third זַכּ֔וּר <WH2139> zak-Kur, to Zaccur בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הָרְבִיעִי֙ <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I The fourth לַיִּצְרִ֔י <WH3339> lai-yitz-Ri, to Izri בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הַחֲמִישִׁ֣י <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi The fifth נְתַנְיָ֔הוּ <WH5418> ne-tan-Ya-hu, to Nethaniah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשִּׁשִּׁ֣י <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi The sixth בֻקִּיָּ֔הוּ <WH1232> vuk-ki-Ya-hu, to Bukkiah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁבִעִ֣י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I The seventh יְשַׂרְאֵ֔לָה <WH3480> ye-sar-'E-lah, to Jesharelah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁמִינִ֣י <WH8066> hash-she-mi-Ni The eighth יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> ye-sha'-Ya-hu, to Jeshaiah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הַתְּשִׁיעִ֣י <WH8671> hat-te-shi-'I The ninth מַתַּנְיָ֔הוּ <WH4983> mat-tan-Ya-hu, to Mattaniah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הָעֲשִׂירִ֣י <WH6224> ha-'a-si-Ri The tenth שִׁמְעִ֔י <WH8096> shim-'I, to Shimei בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> 'ash-tei- eleven עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten עֲזַרְאֵ֔ל <WH5832> 'a-zar-'El, to Azareel בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁנֵ֤ים <WH8147> hash-she-Neim both עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten לַחֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <WH2811> la-cha-shav-Yah, to Hashabiah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> lish-lo-Shah three עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten שֽׁוּבָאֵ֔ל <WH7619> shu-va-'El, to Shubael בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְאַרְבָּעָ֤ה <WH702> le-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen מַתִּתְיָ֔הוּ <WH4993> mat-tit-Ya-hu, to Mattithiah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לַחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> la-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen לִֽירֵמ֔וֹת <WH3406> li-re-Mot, to Jeremoth בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְשִׁשָּׁ֤ה <WH8337> le-shish-Shah six עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen לַחֲנַנְיָ֔הוּ <WH2608> la-cha-nan-Ya-hu, to Hananiah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> le-shiv-'Ah seven עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen לְיָשְׁבְּקָ֔שָׁה <WH3436> le-ya-she-be-Ka-shah, to Joshbekashah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לִשְׁמוֹנָ֤ה <WH8083> lish-mo-Nah eight עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen לַחֲנָ֔נִי <WH2607> la-cha-Na-ni, to Hanani בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְתִשְׁעָ֤ה <WH8672> le-tish-'Ah nine עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen לְמַלּ֔וֹתִי <WH4413> le-mal-Lo-ti, to Mallothi בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> le-'es-Rim The twentieth לֶֽאֱלִיָּ֔תָה <WH448> le-'e-li-Ya-tah, to Eliathah בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְאֶחָ֤ד <WH259> le-'e-Chad The one וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twentieth לְהוֹתִ֔יר <WH1956> le-ho-Tir, to Hothir בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לִשְׁנַ֤יִם <WH8147> lish-Na-yim The two וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twentieth לְגִדַּ֔לְתִּי <WH1437> le-gid-Dal-ti, to Giddalti בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> lish-lo-Shah The three וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twentieth לְמַ֣חֲזִיא֔וֹת <WH4238> le-Ma-cha-zi-'ot, to Mahazioth בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְאַרְבָּעָ֤ה <WH702> le-'ar-ba-'Ah The four וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twentieth לְרוֹמַ֣מְתִּי le-ro-Mam-ti עָ֔זֶר <WH7320> 'A-zer, to Romamtiezer בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten פ Peh
